body.name: MAONO XLR/USB Dynamic Microphone, RGB Podcast Mic with Software for Streaming, Gaming, Recording, Voice-Over, Metal Microphone with Mute, Headphone Jack, Gain Knob & Volume Control-PD200X (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
features: CUSTOM DYNAMIC CAPSULE: The built-in dynamic mic capsule help you capture deep lows, delicate highs, and crisp mid-tones. Ultra wide frequency response of 40Hz-16KHz present crystal clear and clean sound. Cardioid polar pattern reject any unwanted background noise in your recording and streaming.

UNLOCK THE POTENTIAL IN MAONO LINK: Choose the perfect tone from your microphone, and you can turn on/off the RGB light or switch in 9 different colors, also supports EQ, limiter, and compressor adjustment in USB mode.

USB AND XLR CONNECTIVITIES: Plug-and-play when recording on desktop or laptop by plugging the 8.2ft USB cable directly. XLR analog output for connecting to all professional interfaces, mixer or portable PA system when podcasting in your studio.

2-in-1 SMART KNOB: Everything in your control, the podcast microphone have a 2-in-1 smart knob to adjust mic gain, headphone volume, one click mute key with LED indicator help you instantly mute the mic, and real-time monitoring of 3.5 mm headphone jack monitor output voice as desired by recording professionals.

CONTROLLED RGB LIGHTING: The gaming microphone have dynamic multi-color gradients and 8 static solid-color effects, which creates a personalized gaming atmosphere and makes your streaming more appealing. You can press the button at the bottom of the microphone to switch the different color and turn on/off the RGB, turn off the RGB need 2 seconds.
METAL CONSTRUCTION: Higher standard microphone materails and craftsmanship to protect the microphone from being hurt easily as well as the internal structure.
WHAT'S IN THE BOX: Dynamic Microphone, Shock Mount, 2.5m USB-C to USB-A/C Cable, 5/8'' to 3/8'' Adapter, User's Manual, 18 Months Free Warranty (NOTE: XLR CABLE NOT INCLUDED)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ULTRA CLEAN SOUND The premium dynamic mic capsule help you capture deep lows, delicate highs, and crisp mid-tones. Ultra wide frequency response of 40Hz-16KHz present crystal clear and clean sound. FURTHER NOISE REDUCTION Cardioid polar pattern focuses on the sound from the front of the mic top and minimizes ambient noises. The external shock mount eases unwanted low frequency vibration from desk and mechanical noise.
USB OUTPUT USB Output is plug and play for connection to computers and mobile devices.

2-IN-1 SMART KNOB Press the onboard 2-in-1 smart knob to adjust mic gain, headphone volume in USB mode. And it's synchronized in real time with the software. TAP TO MUTE One click mute key with LED indicator help you instantly mute the mic in USB mode. REAL-TIME MONITORING Ensure that you are getting perfect audio at all times with the direct headphone monitoring output. Controlled RGB Lighting RGB ring on the gaming mic have dynamic multi-color gradients and 8 static solid-color effects, which creates a personalized gaming atmosphere and makes your streaming more appealing.
Previous page Next page 1 PODCASTING 2 RECORDING 3 STREAMING 4 ONLINE CONFERENCE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Professional-Grade Audio and User-Friendly Experience
reviews.reviewText: Amazing Quality Build:The PD200x microphone boasts an impressive build quality, designed to withstand rigorous use. Constructed with durable materials, the microphone feels solid and reliable in hand. The sturdy metal body not only adds to its durability but also enhances its professional appearance. This ensures that the microphone can withstand the demands of regular use, providing long-lasting performance.Amazing Audio Quality:When it comes to audio quality, the PD200x microphone truly shines. It captures crisp, clear, and studio-quality sound, making it suitable for a wide range of recording applications. Whether you're a podcaster, vocalist, YouTuber, or gamer, this microphone delivers exceptional audio reproduction, capturing the nuances and details of your voice with precision. The cardioid polar pattern helps reduce background noise, ensuring focused and high-quality recordings.Simple Software:The included software for the PD200x microphone is user-friendly and intuitive. It provides essential features for adjusting microphone settings, such as gain control, sample rate, and headphone volume. The software allows you to fine-tune the microphone to your specific requirements, ensuring optimal audio performance. Despite its simplicity, the software offers sufficient customization options to achieve the desired sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mic For The Price
reviews.reviewText: Using this Mic for streaming! It works beautifully! Sounds great! I’m using it with an XLR the quality is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly with my audio interface
reviews.reviewText: Bought myself this as a Christmas present and I was pleasantly surprised by the audio quality! I've used it as a USB mic and as an XLR mic with my auto interface and I think it sounds great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Sure at First
reviews.reviewText: When I got this I was not sure about it. I was worried about buying a cheaper non pro brand mic. But when I started using it, I really liked it! It sounds nice had good features. You can plug headphone into the mic to get the sound before your processing. XLR or USB makes it very useful. I have it plugged into my pc for simple recording and into a mixer when I have more mics. The software is good, I wish it had a few other features but it has everything it needs, EQ, etc. I would definitely buy another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great USB mic for the price (XLR too)
reviews.reviewText: Coming from a fifine 40$ mic that i bought years ago, for the $75 I paid when it wasn’t on sale was a great deal. It sounds full and clearer then my other usb mic and my friends could instantly tell a difference.*important note: if your XLR this mic the program does not work nor does the headset feedback, these are usb only features*It has option for XLR, which I will be trying out in the future with fifins new XLR interface, But for USB it’s more then enough for even a YouTuber with some adjusting. I do use this for my own videos and it’s sound clarity and quality is above its price point. Also it’s recommended to talk into the top of the mix not the sides. The way this capsule is designed your best sound quality is from the top.The program works well and isn’t sloppy like I thought it would be. It’s well put together with intuitive design and lay outs. You can mute your mic, Change your RgB color and brightness form it and even have advanced options for mic sound adjustment like EQ (tip: they don’t work that well your better off leaving it alone).The mute button feels good and is clicky but not cheap clicky , it feels premium.Cons:The RGb button on the bottom of the mic is hard to press in to activate and it’s in a weird spot so I’d recommend using the program for the mic which you can also adjust all rgb settings like color and brightness within it.The “gains” dial on the mic is also pretty “meh” with no Phyisical markings on it so it’s hard to tell how much gain your at. I’d recommend messing with your “gain” setting in the program as well. In fact I recommend using this mic pretty much entirely off the app itself and not the mic itself.A negative about the mic is when you turn your computer off your rgb stays on so you’ll need to use the button or turn it off in the app before turning off your computer.The ring that holds the mic does feel cheap. the mic itself feels and looks premium but the ring is this ugly glossy plastic that looks like it’s where a lot of the cost cutting was at.The last con is the buttons and dials on the mic. Your RGb is on the bottom which you can’t get to and your gain and mute button become impossible to see when your talking into the top of the mic. This is a preference thing but just be mindful of this when your pick out your mics, with this one you’ll have a hard time controlling it from the mic if your not using an XLR or the app to control its settings which seems like how it was mostly intended to be used anyways.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad I bought this mic
reviews.reviewText: It's cool, it works very well, and it has both the usb plug, and a component plug. very cool, and helpful. easy to set up, and sounds amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The shock mount feels like cheap plastic.But the mic is incredibly solid and good overall (Quality, material, and value for the pocket)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wanted something better than my headset mic to use on discord and in game voice chat. But didn’t want to spend too much on a preamp and xlr mic (too many cables). After some research I came across this mic and it fit the bill perfectly!It’s pretty much plug n play and if you wanna download the software for it it’s pretty good too. You can adjust things like gain, vocal pattern, limiter and other stuff, no settings for highs, mids, and lows but that’s to be expected at this price point tbh. Friends say it’s def an upgrade compared to my previous mic though!There’s a 3.5mm headphone Jack built into the back of the mic for your headphones and a mute button on it too (on the mic) it turns red when you’re muted to that’s pretty cool and you can turn on mic monitoring to make sure everything sounds good.Got options for usb connection (usb c and it has an adapter for standard usb connection) AND it’s got XLR connection in case I do want to buy a preamp to hook it up to. Curious to see what the quality would be like using that instead of the usb connection but even with usb it sounds really clear!All in all, I would recommend this to anyone on a budget looking to buy something that’s great quality but not wanting to break the bank.
Das Mikro hat einen guten klaren Sound und muss sich vor höher preisigen Kollegen nicht verstecken. Plug and Play und es hört sich schon sehr gut an, kaum wahrnehmbares Grundrauschen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Connected this to my pc easily. The sound was really clear and you can immediately tell it is fantastic quality as it performs really well. Use it regularly for streaming with no issues at all.

Ich hatte zuvor das Fduce sl40 bestellt, jedoch war dies, zumindest am Mac, schlichtweg nicht nutzbar da es viel zu dumpf klang.Nach einem Testvideo welches ich auf Youtube gesehen habe entschied ich es mit diesem Modell zu probieren und diesmal bin ich sehr zufrieden.Super Klang, es gibt eine Software dazu mit der man viele Dinge einstellen kann, abhängig von der Umgebung sehr nützlich.Monitoring direkt am Mic über 3,5mm Klinke ist perfekt und ohne Delay.Top Mic für Podcasts, läuft gut mit Garageband, Reaper oder auch Davinci Resolve.Klare Empfehlung.

reviews.reviewTitle: schon seit Monaten im Einsatz und für gut befunden
reviews.reviewText: Das MAONO XLR/USB-Podcast-Mikrofon ist ein dynamisches PC-Mikrofon, das sich ideal für Aufnahmen, Streaming, Gaming und Voice-Over eignet. Das Metallmikrofon hat eine weiße Farbe und wird mit einer Software geliefert.Der erste Eindruck von dem Mikrofon ist sehr gut. Es sieht hochwertig aus und fühlt sich solide an. Das Gewicht des Mikrofons vermittelt den Eindruck von Qualität und Langlebigkeit.Die Soundqualität des MAONO Mikrofons ist beeindruckend. Es nimmt klare und detaillierte Töne auf und eliminiert Hintergrundgeräusche effektiv. Die Stimme kommt gut zur Geltung und klingt unverfälscht. Es ist ideal für Podcaster oder Musiker, die eine professionelle Klangqualität benötigen.Die mitgelieferte Software ist einfach zu bedienen und bietet verschiedene Einstellungsmöglichkeiten. Mit dem Tap-to-Mute Feature kann das Mikrofon schnell stummgeschaltet werden, was praktisch ist, wenn man Gespräche führt oder Pausen machen möchte.Ein weiteres Highlight des MAONO Mikrofons ist der Kopfhöreranschluss. Das ermöglicht das direkte Monitoring der Stimme, was besonders während Live-Auftritten oder Streams hilfreich ist. Das Mikrofon hat auch einen Verstärkungsregler, der es ermöglicht, die Lautstärke individuell anzupassen.Zusammenfassend ist das MAONO XLR/USB-Podcast-Mikrofon eine ausgezeichnete Wahl für alle, die eine hohe Klangqualität und anpassbare Funktionen benötigen. Es ist gut verarbeitet, bietet eine einfache Bedienung und überzeugt mit einem beeindruckenden Klang.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Superb quality and crystal sound with a cool look
reviews.reviewText: I've had a couple of Maono audio products and have been impressed at the quality each time, so I'm pleased to find that it's also the case with this quality podcast mic. For a start, they have their broad target audience understood, with both the studio-style XLR socket as well as a USB-C one for laptop-based setups. It's the USB-C one I was using, and although a USB-C to USB-A cable is provided, I used it without any issues with a USB-C to USB-C too (note - no XLR cable included).It's beautifully crafted, with a solid, quality-feel chassis for the mic that has a decent weight to it, which also houses the volume/gain/mute controls. Impressively, there's also a 3.5mm jack output for monitoring direct from the mic, which is a huge bonus if you're socket-short, or using a slower/older laptop. Most importantly, pickup on it is superb for spoken voice, with a crisp, clear vocal when I recorded via the mic in GarageBand.Top top it all off, it makes a very cool-looking addition to a home studio setup with the LED back-lighting on the controls, all controllable via the button on the base.It's another expert piece of audio kit from Maono, which adds a pro touch to a home podcasting rig - heartily recommend it for hobbyists and semi-professionals alike.
